header.name: Daniel Tarazona
header.title: Mobile Developer / Shooter / Martial Artist
header.summary: Developer, Shooter, and Martial Artist with 8+ years of iOS development experience and 6+ years of martial arts practice. Proven track record of delivering high-impact mobile applications that increased user retention, reduced fraud, and accelerated deployment. Expert in AI integration for scalable, user-centric solutions.

education.coursework: Sports Shooting practitioner focused on precision and control under pressure. National event competitor demonstrating discipline and mental focus. Transferable skills to software development including attention to detail and stress management in high-pressure environments.
VIP Escort Course covering personal protection tactics, threat assessment, and security protocols.

education.degree: Bachelor's in Software Engineering (Coursework; In Progress)
education.coursework: Mastered advanced data structures and interpreters in Scheme (Lisp) and C++, computer processors and architecture, interactive Java programming, calculus, linear algebra, physics, machine learning, artificial intelligence, and game design and development in Unity. Technologies: Scheme (Lisp), Racket (Lisp), C/C++, Java, Python, Jupyter, and LaTeX.

projects.name: Lululemon Athletica - GuestApp - iOS App

Led UI/UX advancements in SwiftUI for specialized health app serving expectant mothers. Integrated Firebase for authentication.
